column1: Six years have passed since I resolved on my present undertaking.
During her illness, many arguments had been urged to persuade my mother to refrain from attending upon her.
She died calmly; and her countenance expressed affection even in death.
My cat is a strange little dude.

column1: Have you read the Doraemon comics yet?
